Header.title: This is our Final Year Project
Header.paragraph: In this website, we are going to present our community searching to the users.

About.paragraph: We are the students from the Chinese University of Hong kong and studying computer engineering and computer science. The website provide the community search function for academic use.

Contact.address: The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shatin, NT, Hong Kong SAR, The People's Republic of China

Features.title: K-core
Features.text: K-Core is a measure that can help identify small interlinked core areas on a network. To be included in the K-Core, an entity must be linked to at least k other entities in the group.

Features.title: K-truss
Features.text: K-truss is a building truss in which the vertical member and two oblique members in each panel form a K.

Features.title: K-clique
Features.text: K-clique in a graph is a sub-graph where the distance between any two vertices is no greater than k.
